message: Hi Bob, I'm offering my product to you for $17000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm a bit of a savvy buyer, and I've done my research on similar products. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12000 is significantly below my minimum price.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $15500, which is still a fair deal for both of us.  This is a one-time offer, so let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $15500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $13750. This is my final offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.
